title: Crash on startup when opening the app
body:
The application crashes on startup on macOS 14.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Install
2. Launch

Expected: app opens
Actual: crash dialog
Version: 2.0.0

title: Data loss when saving configuration
body:
After saving, the config file becomes empty.
This looks like data loss.
Version: 1.9.1
Steps to reproduce:
1. Edit config
2. Save

title: Add support for exporting reports to PDF
body: It would be great to export the generated report as a PDF for sharing with stakeholders.

title: README: installation command is outdated
body: The README mentions `pip install .` but the recommended method should be `pip install -e ".[dev]"`.

title: How do I enable the OpenAI-compatible adapter?
body: How do I configure the environment variables for the OpenAI adapter?

title: Bug: CLI prints extra logs before JSON
body: When running `triage-assistant triage`, I see debug logs before the JSON output.\nThis breaks piping into jq.

title: Improve error message when body file is missing
body: If `--body-file` points to a missing file, show a clearer message and non-zero exit code.

title: Docs: fix typo in workshop module 01_setup
body: There is a typo: 'extenstion' should be 'extension'.

title: Regression: priority is always p2 for bugs
body:
After the last change, bug issues are no longer prioritized as p1.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Run triage on a crash issue
2. Observe priority=p2

title: Question: what label taxonomy should we use?
body: Do we have a standard set of labels for the workshop (bug/feature/docs/question, p0/p1/p2, etc.)?

title: Security: possible command injection in adapter selection
body: If adapter selection uses untrusted input, could it lead to command injection? Please review.

title: Add a local evaluation command for quick checks
body: Provide a `triage-assistant eval` command that runs a dataset and prints simple metrics.

title: Bug: JSON schema command outputs invalid JSON
body: Running `triage-assistant schema` outputs something that can't be parsed by json.loads.

title: Clarify how to run prompt files in VS Code
body: The workshop should explain how to invoke prompt files via `/` in the Chat view.

title: Feature: add `--pretty` output option
body: Please add a `--pretty` flag so JSON is indented for humans.

title: Bug: labels contain duplicates with different casing
body: Sometimes I see labels like `bug` and `BUG` together.
